cantonese: 我哋打啤牌消磨時間。

cantonese: 你唔覺得間屋喺度震緊咩？

cantonese: 你有冇鉛筆呀？

cantonese: 你啲英文學成點呀？
english: How are you getting along with your English study?

cantonese: 我會永遠同你喺埋一齊。
english: I'll be with you forever.

cantonese: 套戲好唔好睇呀？

cantonese: 套戲好唔好睇呀？

cantonese: 啲電影全部都好悶。
english: All the films are boring.

cantonese: 個司機問我應該行邊邊。

cantonese: 佢啲駕駛技術好差，但係都勉強通過咗個駕駛考試。

cantonese: 你有冇打火機呀？

cantonese: 我做完功課，想瞓陣覺，但係又要返學⋯⋯
english: Now that I have finished this assignment I want to go to sleep, but I have to go to school.

cantonese: 呢朵花係黃色嘅，但係其他嗰啲全部都係藍色嘅。
english: This flower is yellow, but all the others are blue.

cantonese: 呢首歌令我諗返起我細個嗰陣啲嘢。
english: This song reminds me of my childhood.

cantonese: 呢間屋要維修吓喇。
english: This house must be done up.

cantonese: 呢間屋係我嘅。
english: This house is mine.

cantonese: 我今個夏天諗住踩單車環遊歐洲。
english: I'll travel across Europe by bicycle this summer.

cantonese: 呢支鉛筆有幾長呀？
english: How long is this pencil?

cantonese: 我覺得呢套戲值得一睇再睇。
english: I think it is worthwhile to see this film twice.

cantonese: 我想問吓修理呢張凳要幾多錢呀？
english: What would it cost to have this chair repaired?

cantonese: 呢粒蘋果好酸。
english: This apple tastes sour.

cantonese: 呢部收音機幾多錢呀？
english: What is the price of this radio?

cantonese: 好似咁嘅錯誤好容易被忽略㗎。
english: Mistakes like these are easily overlooked.

cantonese: 呢架小巴可以坐到廿五個人。
english: This minibus holds 25 persons.

cantonese: 呢間酒店裝得落一千人。
english: This hotel has accommodations for 1000 guests.

cantonese: 呢支原子筆我買咗兩蚊。
english: I bought this ball-point for two dollars.

cantonese: 呢支筆係我㗎。
english: This pen belongs to me.

cantonese: 你想用呢支筆，我就借俾你啦。
english: If you want this pen, I will lend it to you.

cantonese: 呢塊牛扒好香。
english: This beefsteak smells good.

cantonese: 呢間舖頭啲漢堡包好味過嗰間嗰啲。
english: This store's hamburgers taste better than that one's.

cantonese: 呢支玫瑰好靚呀。
english: This rose is very beautiful.

cantonese: 呢架巴士載到五十個人。
english: This bus can hold fifty people.

cantonese: 呢啲睡衣好吸汗。
english: These pajamas absorb sweat well.

cantonese: 唔該你裝啲水落呢個桶度吖。
english: Please fill this bucket with water.

cantonese: 呢個桶穿咗個窿。
english: There's a hole in this bucket.

cantonese: 呢啲黏液可以當膠水用。
english: This sticky liquid can be substituted for glue.

cantonese: 呢條呔幾多錢呀？
english: How much is this tie?

cantonese: 呢把刀好利。
english: This knife cuts well.

cantonese: 嗰條裙睇落好似好貴噉。
english: That dress seems to be very expensive.

cantonese: 呢張枱同我哋屋企嗰張一樣大。
english: This table is just as large as ours.

cantonese: 呢張梳化幾多錢呀？
english: How much is this sofa?

cantonese: 有人喺呢張梳化度瞓過。
english: Somebody has been sleeping on this sofa.

cantonese: 呢間游水學校每個月要俾幾多學費㗎？
english: How much is the monthly fee of this swimming school?

cantonese: 你話兜啫喱凝咗未吖嗱？
english: Do you think this jelly's firm enough to eat yet?

cantonese: 呢件外套無衫袋㗎。
english: This coat hasn't pockets.

cantonese: 呢隻蛋糕真係冇啲人講到咁好食囉。
english: This cake doesn't really live up to its reputation.

cantonese: 呢條規則唔係幾時都啱用㗎。
english: This rule doesn't apply to every case.

cantonese: 呢部相機冇嗰部咁貴。
english: This camera is less expensive than that one.

cantonese: 你可唔可以用呢部相機幫我哋影幅相呀？
english: Would you take a picture of us with this camera?
